tickers.title: Stock Tickers
tickers.description: List of tickers (e.g., NVDA, RVNL.NS, RELIANCE.BO). If empty, auto-discovers trending.

useTrending.title: Auto-Discover Trending
useTrending.description: If no tickers provided, find top movers automatically.

threshold.title: Volatility Threshold (%)
threshold.description: Minimum move percentage to trigger analysis.

discordWebhook.title: Discord Webhook URL
discordWebhook.description: Post alerts directly to a chat channel.

sendEmail.title: Send Email Alerts
sendEmail.description: If enabled, sends an email report.

recipientEmail.title: Recipient Email
recipientEmail.description: Required if 'Send Email' is checked. The address to receive alerts.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Required to scrape Google/Yahoo without blocking.
